summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via Add Manga dialog layout changes (fixed header/footer + scrollable body) and a new frontend readiness/retry layer (useBackendReadiness, useActorWithRetry, gating in manga queries/mutations, and error classification). One additional documentation/checklist file was added that was not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a standalone regression checklist markdown document for Add Manga dialog layout testing.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for new documentation files; only UI/layout and stability behavior changes were requested.
